articles.description: This Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 5 deal reduces the price of the powerful foldable to a much more palatable $1,349.99.
articles.content: We havent seen the device on sale for less than $1,500 before today since its launch earlier in the summer, so this is quite the offer. The higher-capacity 512GB variant of the Samsung phone is also … [+871 chars]

articles.title: Google's Pixel 8 Software Update Plan Could Help All Phone Buyers - CNET
articles.description: Commentary: Google's promise should push competing brands to step up, making more phones safer to use for the long haul.
articles.content: Google's new seven-year software update commitment for the Pixel 8 and Pixel 8 Pro is a significant step forward for Android. But it also highlights one of the biggest weaknesses most Android phones … [+11461 chars]
